title: Update Contact details (address, phone, email) across Contact section and footer

requirements.text:
Update the Contact section business details to show the provided ML Enterprise address, phone number, and email ID (replace the current placeholder contact info). Use the exact values:
- Address: "Tongdentsuyong Ward, A.M Road, Mokokchung, Nagaland 798601"
- Phone: "9366012115"
- Email: "mlenterprisemkg@gmail.com"

quotes:
Tongdentsuyong Ward, A.M Road 
Mokokchung, Nagaland : 798601
Mobile No : 9366012115
Email id : mlenterprisemkg@gmail.com
add address and phone no and email id

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/site/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the 'Location', 'Phone', and 'Email' cards display the provided address/phone/email instead of placeholders.
Business Hours remains unchanged unless explicitly provided otherwise.
All user-facing text remains in English.

requirements.text: Update the site footer contact details to match the provided address, phone number, and email ID (replace the current placeholder values).

quotes: add address and phone no and email id

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx`, the Contact list shows the provided address, phone, and email instead of the current placeholders.
Footer continues to render without layout overflow on mobile widths.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui` (immutable paths).
Keep all user-facing content in English.
nonGoals: Implementing or changing the shipment tracking feature (not part of this request).
Changing backend inquiry storage or submission behavior.
